components.name: Verify
components.description: May be impacted by SMS delivery issues

components.name: Customer Support Center
components.description: This includes services related to reaching support via phone, email, and chat.

incidents.name: SMS Delivery Delays to Orange in Burkina Faso

incident_updates.body: We continue to experience SMS delivery delays to Orange in Burkina Faso. Our engineers are working with our carrier partner to resolve the issue. We will provide another update in 4 hours or as soon as more information becomes available.

affected_components.name: CARRIER NETWORK - SMS, Middle East & Africa

incident_updates.body: We continue to experience SMS delivery delays to Orange in Burkina Faso. Our engineers are working with our carrier partner to resolve the issue. We will provide another update in 2 hours or as soon as more information becomes available.

affected_components.name: CARRIER NETWORK - SMS, Middle East & Africa

incident_updates.body: After monitoring, we observed that we are continuing to experience SMS delivery delays when sending messages to Orange in Burkina Faso. Our engineers are working with our carrier partner to resolve the issue. We expect to provide another update in 1 hour or as soon as more information becomes available.

affected_components.name: CARRIER NETWORK - SMS, Middle East & Africa

incident_updates.body: We are observing recovery in SMS delivery delays when sending messages to Orange in Burkina Faso. We will continue monitoring the service to ensure a full recovery. We will provide another update in 2 hours or as soon as more information becomes available.

affected_components.name: CARRIER NETWORK - SMS, Middle East & Africa

incidents.name: SMS Delivery Delays to and from Vodafone Network in the UK over a subset of UK longcodes

incident_updates.body: We continue to experience SMS delivery delays when sending messages to and receiving messages from Vodafone Network in the UK over a subset of UK longcodes. Our engineers are working with our carrier partner to resolve the issue. We will provide another update in 4 hours or as soon as more information becomes available.

We continue to experience SMS delivery delays when sending messages to and receiving messages from Vodafone Network in the UK over a subset of UK longcodes. Our engineers are working with our carrier partner to resolve the issue. We will provide another update in 2 hours or as soon as more information becomes available.

We are experiencing SMS delivery delays when sending messages to and receiving messages from Vodafone Network in the UK over a subset of UK longcodes. Our engineers are working with our carrier partner to resolve the issue. We will provide another update in 1 hour or as soon as more information becomes available.

incidents.name: Inbound Call Failures to a Subset of Twilio Argentina Phone Numbers

incident_updates.body: We are continuing to observe a subset of call failures to Twilio Argentina phone numbers. We are currently working with our carrier partner to resolve the issue. We expect to provide another update in 24 hours or as soon as more information becomes available.

The Beeline network in Russia is conducting a planned maintenance from 26 January 2023 at 10:00 PST until 26 January 2023 at 13:00 PST. During the maintenance window, there could be intermittent delays delivering SMS to and from Beeline Russia handsets.

scheduled_maintenances.name: UK SMS Carrier Maintenance - O2 UK

incident_updates.body: The O2 network in UK is conducting an emergency maintenance from 26 January 2023 at 13:45 PST until 26 January 2023 at 22:00 PST. During the maintenance window, there could be intermittent delays delivering SMS to and from O2 UK handsets.

The Vodafone network in Egypt is conducting a planned maintenance from 26 January 2023 at 15:00 PST until 26 January 2023 at 20:00 PST. During the maintenance window, there could be intermittent delays delivering SMS to and from Vodafone Egypt handsets.

affected_components.name: CARRIER NETWORK - SMS, Middle East & Africa

incident_updates.body: Our Voice carrier partner is conducting a planned maintenance from 28 January 2023 at 08:00 PST until 28 January 2023 at 14:00 PST. During the maintenance window, there could be intermittent call disconnects and call failures for calls to a subset of Twilio Singapore phone numbers.

The Beeline network in Russia is conducting a planned maintenance from 28 January 2023 at 11:00 PST until 28 January 2023 at 20:00 PST. During the maintenance window, there could be intermittent delays delivering SMS to and from Beeline Russia handsets.

The Yota network in Russia is conducting a planned maintenance from 28 January 2023 at 11:00 PST until 28 January 2023 at 20:00 PST . During the maintenance window, there could be intermittent delays delivering SMS to and from Yota Russia handsets.

The Megafon network in Russia is conducting a planned maintenance from 28 January 2023 at 11:00 PST until 28 January 2023 at 20:00 PST . During the maintenance window, there could be intermittent delays delivering SMS to and from Megafon Russia handsets.

Our SMS/MMS carrier partner in US is conducting a planned maintenance from 28 January 2023 at 22:00 PST until 29 January 2023 at 05:00 PST. During the maintenance window, there could be intermittent delays delivering SMS/MMS to and from US handsets via a subset of US Longcode and US Shortcode.

The Beeline network in Russia is conducting an emergency maintenance from 30 January 2023 at 12:00 PST until 30 January 2023 at 15:00 PST. During the maintenance window, there could be intermittent delays delivering SMS to and from Beeline Russia handsets.

Our Voice carrier partner is conducting a planned maintenance from 30 January 2023 at 16:00 PST until 30 January 2023 at 18:00 PST. During the maintenance window, there could be call drops to a subset of Twilio Germany and Austria phone numbers.

scheduled_maintenances.name: SMS Carrier Partner Maintenance - All Orange Networks

incident_updates.body:
The Orange network in multiple countries is conducting a planned maintenance from 30 January 2023 at 20:30 PST until 30 January 2023 at 23:00 PST During the maintenance window, there could be intermittent delays delivering SMS to and from Orange handsets in the following countries:

Egypt
Myanmar

Senegal
Burkina Faso
